metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19993 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: A reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Dolibarr 8.0.2 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the transphrase parameter to public/notice.php.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
